text: == Events == === By place === ==== Oceania ==== * A major eruption of Mount Merapi volcano covers all of central Java with volcanic ash. This caused devastation throughout central Java, and destroyed a Hindu kingdom on the island of Java. ==== Europe ==== * Holmgang (dueling) is declared illegal in Iceland. ==== Asia ==== * Granaries for famine relief are set up across China. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * Aelfheah (St. Alphege) goes to Pope John XVIII at Rome for his pallium and becomes Archbishop of Canterbury. ==== Astronomy ==== * May 1 - The brightest supernova ever recorded, SN 1006, occurs in the constellation of Lupus. It is observed and described in China, Japan, the Middle East, Europe, and elsewhere. == Births == * Constantine X, emperor of Byzantium (d. 1067) == Deaths == * Gisela of Burgundy == References == Category:1006
